channel.title: PS3 headset help?
channel.description: Alright i got call of duty 4 for my ps3. I also have a usb headset and i hooked it up and everything but i cant talk to anyone. It should work by just talking into it. but it doesnt. So i was wondering if there are settings for it that i need to change or a button i need to push down.

item.title: PS3 headset help?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Check if it works in the voice changer settings thing.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 headset help?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:3, topic:168606”]Well i used to use my old socom 2 headset i got with the game for ps2 and this is what i did:
Settings -> Accessory Settings -> Audio Device settings -> set the input and output to your USB headset.[/quote]

maybe i wasnt talking loud enough. when i get home ill check everything because that is what i did.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 headset help?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Well i used to use my old socom 2 headset i got with the game for ps2 and this is what i did:
Settings -> Accessory Settings -> Audio Device settings -> set the input and output to your USB headset.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 headset help?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Make sure your mic is ok in accessory settings. You don’t need to push down a button, it picks up voices. (Can be annoying at times).

Read full topic
